content: 6 sts turn 9 chain 3 this is your first stitch treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 7 sts * treble_crochet double_crochet into each of the 3 chains chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in each of the 3 chains treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 8 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times treble_crochet double_crochet into each of the 3 chains chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in each of the 3 chains treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 8 sts turn 10 chain 3 this is your first stitch treble_crochet double_crochet into every st and every chain space 98 stitches in total turn from now on you just repeat row 3 to 10 until you reached your desired length i managed to make 19 row of daisies in total i then finished with a row of treble_crochet s double_crochet s and then a row of half_double_crochet s half_double_crochet s i would highly recommend blocking your wrap once finished this will bring out the design more and flatten those ripples i hope you enjoy making this pattern as much as i did i would love to see your own versions of my pattern so please follow and tag me on facebook and instagram happy hooking suzy x this is a simplified chart pattern it shows the beginning and ends of the row the repeat section is highlighted in red this is the section you repeat 5 more times across the row then end as the chart shows
